name: 15th Annual Meet on Pharmacovigilance & Drug Safety
content: PHARMACOVIGILLANCE 2022 an extensive range of critically important sessions from basic research to recent innovations. The theme: “Growth & Future of Pharmacovigilance & Drug Safety” is designed for professionals at all levels and career phases of the Pharmacovigilance & Drug Safety industry, who want to improve their understanding of what will drive and shape the future of the market. Pharmacovigilance Conference| Pharmaceutical Conference| Pharmacology & Pharmacovigilance conference| Drug Safety Conference Annual meet on pharmacovigilance & Drug Safety ( Pharmacovigillance 2022) to be held at Rome, Italy during March 24-25 We would like to invite you to the upcoming conference on “Pharmacovigilance & Drug Safety” Which is going to be held on March 24-25, 2022 Rome, Italy. Abstract Link: PHARMACOVIGILLANCE 2022 Registration Link: PHARMACOVIGILLANCE 2022 Online Registrations and Abstract submission are open. Submit your abstract and confirm your slot. If you are interested write to: honeyrosy501@gmail.com
